idinfo.useconst: None provided credit is given to the Pennsylvania Fish and Boat Commission (PFBC) as long as the data is in its original unaltered state. If modifications are made to the data set, users are obligated to describe the types of modifications they have made. Users are not to misrepresent PFBC data sets, nor to imply that changes they (users) have made were approved by the PFBC.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.0.1324

procstep.procdesc: The data set was created by selecting the approprate segements from the National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) streams layer corresponding to the water trail extents. The segements were merged together to form the water trail lines.

qhorizpa.horizpae: Based on the 1:24000 National Hydrography Dataset (NHD) Flowing Waters layer.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdefs: PFBC Bureau of Boating and Education

attr.attrdef: Water Trail Unique Identifier (for mapping purposes)
attr.attrdefs: PFBC Bureau of Boating and Education

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

The FILES and documentation are provided "as is" and the USER assumes the entire risk as to its quality and performance. Those parties involved with the development and distribution of this data will not be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of the use or inability to use the FILES or any accompanying documentation.
